articles.author: George Dvorsky
articles.title: New Close-up Video Shows the Sun's Surface as the Hellscape We Always Imagined - Gizmodo
articles.description: Europe’s Solar Orbiter has captured surreal video of the Sun’s atmosphere, revealing a slew of fascinating—and jaw dropping—stellar features.
articles.content: The recent total solar eclipse on April 8 provided a rare glimpse of the Suns roiling corona, including some eye-grabbing prominences. Those views were neat, but a new video captured by Europes Sun-b… [+2648 chars]
